snippet: In 2010, Alana Beard sustained what could have been a career-ending injury. Two years later, she is with the playoff-bound Los Angeles Sparks.
lead_paragraph: In 2010, Alana Beard sustained what could have been a career-ending injury. Two years later, she is with the playoff-bound Los Angeles Sparks.

headline.seo: 2 Years Removed from W.N.B.A., Alana Beard Jells With Sparks
headline.main: After Injury, Beard Embraces New Outlook, and Team
headline.print_headline: After Injury, Embracing New Outlook, and Team
